title: Your Shop is open for business!

replies.body: Why was that the end time? Why not the logical 23:59?

None of the "my shop" skins interest me, for like the third time in a row.
I guess I don't mind if I keep getting ultimate skins from chests, beggars can't be choosers.
So one of the skin for my 'my shop' is cosmic xayah and I also have cosmic xayah in hextech apparently. So what will be happened if I unlock it in hextech ?

I have a heimerdinger skin... I played a bots game with him around 3-4 weeks ago. I got a MF skin and i dont even know if i have played her for months (though its star guardian and i will buy it). But i did get soraka, darius and camille skins and i do play all 3 of em. So Discountbot got some of it right. 5/7
